item.description:
8:00 - 11 :00 Live Band Showcase @ TOMMY DOYLES: Featuring "Brock and Roll Revival Band" as well as other local area talented musicians. Upstairs in the Loft. More info here

Free Entertainment: Come one come all....come celebrate the holidays with singing your favorite Motown and Christmas carols. Enjoy watching local area talented musicians play along with the live band.

Food: Half price appetizers with a drink purchase. Just mention "Social Fun" when ordering. This offer is not offered to the public so make sure your waitress/waiter knows you are with our group Before your place your order.


HOW TO FIND ME: You can find me by the LED lights on my reindeer antlers....WARNING!!...spontaneous caroling may occur at any moment.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB AT ALL TIMES! There is no charge to attend this event. Please remember that in order to bring you half price appetizers with drink purchase ...a 20% gratuity will be automatically included.

Transportation and Parking: Parking is unrestricted on Sundays, however, leave plenty of time to find a spot. Easiest is to park at Alewife station take the T on the red line to Harvard Square.
item.name: Live Musicians Showcase @ Tommy Doyles (Harvard Square)
